colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (ZHES SHES RAB TSE NOR LHA GSUM GYI SGO NAS YAN LAG BDUN PA 'BUL BA DANG, GSOL BA 'DEBS ZHING SNGAGS BZLAS PA'I TSUL DGOS 'DOD 'BYUNG BA'I DNGOS GRUB MYUR STZOL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI NYE SLOB DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSE LDAN RDO RJES BSKUL BA BZHIN DU, ,BLA MA GONG MA'I GSUNG RGYUN LAS BTUS NAS, DHARMA SVA MI BAKshU BA SU MA TI AA YUR RAKshA BADZRAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NYE SLOB DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL LO, ,'DIS KYANG BDAG SOGS 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS DGOS 'DOD 'BYUNG BA'I DNGOS GRUB THAMS CAD MYUR DU STZOL BAR RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
